name: Might and Magic III: Isles of Terra
overview: Feel the Magic, Accept the Challenge. You are chosen to lead a small band of adventurers through a mysterious new world filled with fantasy, magic and danger. Experience a whole new dimension, where wizards and strange creatures await you. Can you survive the life-threatening hazards and obstacles in your own way? Do you sense the power and darkness of the forces around you? Will you remain a strong and worthy leader during your quest to defeat evil? Begin the most bizarre and wonderful journey you have ever experienced. Master the mystery of Might & Magic III, Isles of Terra. Creatures...Castles...Monsters...Mazes...Spells
